summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Legenddary eBook platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend authentication has integration issues, but all other features work perfectly when authenticated. The platform is feature-complete with excellent UI/UX design.

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submission returns 400 error from frontend, but backend API works perfectly via direct testing
Login form submission returns 401 error from frontend, but backend API works perfectly via direct testing

Navigation elements are present and functional
Feature cards display correctly (8 cards found)
Auth page UI renders properly with excellent styling
Form fields accept input correctly
All backend API endpoints (41/41 tests passed)
User registration API works via direct testing
User login API works via direct testing
Book CRUD operations work correctly
Chapter management functions properly
AI suggestions generate responses (GPT-5.2 integration working)
Image search returns results (12 images found)

Export functionality (PDF/EPUB) works

Dashboard displays correctly with proper stats
Book creation flow works perfectly
Book editor with rich text editing functions properly

UI design is consistent with gold/yellow branding throughout
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication form submission. The backend APIs work perfectly (verified via curl), and all features work correctly when authenticated (verified via token injection). The issue is specifically in the frontend form submission - likely an axios configuration, request format, or form validation issue. Once this is fixed, the platform will be fully functional.
